languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс делает предостерегающий жест. В его голосе, чуть звенящем от напряжения, сквозит беспокойство.{/n} "Стой, {name}. Не приближайся к этому творению {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Ты достаточно сделал{mf||а} для меня и моей миссии — не рискуй собой в этот раз".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс делает предостерегающий жест. В его голосе, чуть звенящем от напряжения, сквозит беспокойство.{/n} "Стой, {name}. Не приближайся к этому творению {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Ты достаточно сделал{mf||а} для меня и моей миссии — не рискуй собой в этот раз".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix makes a warning gesture. His voice, ringing slightly with tension, is threaded with disquiet.{/n} "Stop, {name}. That is a creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, don't go near it. You have done enough for me and my mission — don't put yourself at risk now."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс делает предостерегающий жест. В его голосе, чуть звенящем от напряжения, сквозит беспокойство.{/n} "Стой, {name}. Не приближайся к этому творению {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Ты достаточно сделал{mf||а} для меня и моей миссии — не рискуй собой в этот раз".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix makes a warning gesture. His voice, ringing slightly with tension, is threaded with disquiet.{/n} "Stop, {name}. That is a creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, don't go near it. You have done enough for me and my mission — don't put yourself at risk now."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希做了个警告的手势。由于紧张，他的声音比平时更响一些，声音中带着不安。{/n}“快停下，{name}。那是{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的造物，不要靠近它。你已经为我和我的任务做得够多了，不要再把你自己置于危险之中。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a warning gesture. His voice, ringing slightly with tension, is threaded with disquiet.{/n} "Stop, {name}. That is a creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, don't go near it. You have done enough for me and my mission — don't put yourself at risk now."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希做了个警告的手势。由于紧张，他的声音比平时更响一些，声音中带着不安。{/n}“快停下，{name}。那是{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的造物，不要靠近它。你已经为我和我的任务做得够多了，不要再把你自己置于危险之中。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hace un gesto de advertencia. Su voz, ligeramente cargada de tensión, lleva también la sombra de la inquietud.{/n} «Alto, {name}. Esa es una creación del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}; no se acerque a ella. Ya ha hecho suficiente por mí y por mi misión. No se ponga en riesgo ahora».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a warning gesture. His voice, ringing slightly with tension, is threaded with disquiet.{/n} "Stop, {name}. That is a creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, don't go near it. You have done enough for me and my mission — don't put yourself at risk now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hace un gesto de advertencia. Su voz, ligeramente cargada de tensión, lleva también la sombra de la inquietud.{/n} «Alto, {name}. Esa es una creación del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}; no se acerque a ella. Ya ha hecho suficiente por mí y por mi misión. No se ponga en riesgo ahora».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスが警告するように身振りをする。その声は緊張で震え、不穏な雰囲気を漂わせていた。{/n}「止まってください、{name}さん。アレは{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の創造物です。近づいてはなりません。御身は我と使命のために十分尽くしてくださった…これ以上危険は冒さないでください」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a warning gesture. His voice, ringing slightly with tension, is threaded with disquiet.{/n} "Stop, {name}. That is a creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, don't go near it. You have done enough for me and my mission — don't put yourself at risk now."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスが警告するように身振りをする。その声は緊張で震え、不穏な雰囲気を漂わせていた。{/n}「止まってください、{name}さん。アレは{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の創造物です。近づいてはなりません。御身は我と使命のために十分尽くしてくださった…これ以上危険は冒さないでください」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix macht eine warnende Geste. Seine Stimme klingt angespannt und unruhig.{/n} "Halt, {name}! Das ist eine Schöpfung des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g}, haltet Abstand. Ihr habt genug für mich und meine Mission getan – setzt Euch jetzt keinem Risiko aus."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a warning gesture. His voice, ringing slightly with tension, is threaded with disquiet.{/n} "Stop, {name}. That is a creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, don't go near it. You have done enough for me and my mission — don't put yourself at risk now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix macht eine warnende Geste. Seine Stimme klingt angespannt und unruhig.{/n} "Halt, {name}! Das ist eine Schöpfung des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g}, haltet Abstand. Ihr habt genug für mich und meine Mission getan – setzt Euch jetzt keinem Risiko aus."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix fait un geste d'avertissement. Sa voix légèrement nerveuse trahit son inquiétude.{/n} « Restez où vous êtes, {name}. C'est une création du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}, vous ne devez pas vous en approcher. Vous en avez fait assez pour ma mission et moi, je ne peux pas vous laisser prendre ce risque. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a warning gesture. His voice, ringing slightly with tension, is threaded with disquiet.{/n} "Stop, {name}. That is a creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, don't go near it. You have done enough for me and my mission — don't put yourself at risk now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix fait un geste d'avertissement. Sa voix légèrement nerveuse trahit son inquiétude.{/n} « Restez où vous êtes, {name}. C'est une création du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}, vous ne devez pas vous en approcher. Vous en avez fait assez pour ma mission et moi, je ne peux pas vous laisser prendre ce risque. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, uyarı amaçlı bir işaret yapıyor. Endişeyle titreyen sesindeki gerginlik notalarını hissediyorsun.{/n} "{name}, dur. Yaklaşma, bu gördüğün {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} bir mahlukudur. Benim ve vazifem için gereğinden fazlasını yaptın, kendini tehlikeye atma şimdi."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a warning gesture. His voice, ringing slightly with tension, is threaded with disquiet.{/n} "Stop, {name}. That is a creation of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}, don't go near it. You have done enough for me and my mission — don't put yourself at risk now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, uyarı amaçlı bir işaret yapıyor. Endişeyle titreyen sesinde gerginlik notaları var.{/n} “{name}, dur. Yaklaşma, bu gördüğün bir {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g} mahlukudur. Benim ve vazifem için gereğinden fazlasını yaptın, kendini tehlikeye atma şimdi.”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
